pages.text: $(li)The Nature's Compass is a new variant of the common Compass.$(br)$(li)It can be used to find different Biomes.$(br)$(li)This will help you to find Creatures or Places which only exists in an specific Biome.

$(li)First, just right click while you are holding the Nature's Compass on your hand.$(br)$(li)Then search a Biome, using the searchbox, and the Sort options.$(br)$(li)Now, select it and click the $(l)Start Search$() button to start the Biome Search.$(br)$(li)When the search ends, the Nature's Compass will be indicanting the distance of the Biome and pointing to it too.
